titleStmt.title: A vvorthy speech by Mr. Tho. Abernethie ; wherein is discovered the villany and hellish plots (which himselfe hath been an eie and eare witnesse of) wrought in the Popes courts against these our three kingdomes, and now disclosed this 29, Iuly, 1641.
titleStmt.author: Abernethie, Thomas, fl. 1638-1641.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library and Thomason Collection, British Library.
